adHeader: NATIVE FRENCH TUTOR (Fulbright Scholar at Cal)
adDetails: Bonjour, I am a native French speaker (Fulbright Scholar at UC Berkeley), and I am helping: - Students / with grammar, vocabulary, assignments - Adults / preparing a trip to France and conversation - Professionals / workplace situations and etiquette The rate is $100/hour. Discounts for small-group tutoring. Please visit my website for more information: www.ArianeZambiras.com Merci et a bientot, Ariane
